thread.title: Steve Braun
thread.title_full: United Capital Source reviewed by Steve Braun

author: Steve Braun
title: Steve Braun
text: I worked with Matthew Fonseca, and he did an outstanding job facilitating a loan agreement for my business. He was very thorough in his explanations of the process and explanations, followed up throughout the process, and was efficient while doing so.
